title: Is the price of vintage guitars dropping or predicted to do so? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Vintage” meaning older doesn’t intrinsically make a guitar valuable. But “Vintage” as in ‘rare and collectable’ is likely to mean higher prices, because more people in the world can afford and potentially bid on a particular instrument.
They have somehat leveled off or fallen some. Buying one now would not be c onside red a short term investment.
